name: youtube-indexer-chatbot
description: YouTube video indexing with AI chatbot interface

scripts.build: cd chatbot && bun run build && cd ../youtube-indexer && bun run build
scripts.lint: cd chatbot && bun run lint && cd ../youtube-indexer && bun run lint
scripts.format: cd chatbot && bun run format && cd ../youtube-indexer && bun run format
scripts.clean: rm -rf chatbot/.next chatbot/out chatbot/dist chatbot/*.tsbuildinfo youtube-indexer/dist youtube-indexer/*.tsbuildinfo
